title: Numbers War
outcome: Council factions secretly manipulate BCI algorithms, causing wild and unexplained swings in residents' compliance scores. Trusted citizens are abruptly flagged; others rise unexpectedly. Social chaos erupts: people lose jobs and housing overnight, alliances shift, and public suspicion turns against the Council. Under pressure, the system’s failings become rally points for both reform and crackdown.

events.description: Citizens wake to find compliance scores drastically altered. Families are split across score lines, with some assigned new jobs and housing, and others flagged for monitoring.
Unrest spreads as trusted figures and neighborhood leaders are suddenly deemed dissidents. Community patrols form to protect vulnerable residents from abrupt loss of vital services.
Council infighting escalates: Innovators are accused of covert tampering, while Directorate push for martial protocols. Harmonists struggle to keep government functions steady.
A citywide protest unites high, mid, and low-score residents against the opaque and arbitrary nature of the BCI. Demands for transparency and leadership accountability grow impossible to ignore.
